title: I'm fucking awful and I know these macro game decisions
body:
So when people don't do them, the only possible explanation is that they're trolling. Jungler decides to not take exp on a crashing wave, not break a freeze, not take a free dragon....

Vayne decides to come back top after I roam for a double and she dies, instead of temporarily lane swapping so she gets mid exp 

Vayne decides to follow Darius TP bot into a 100% lost 3v4 instead of trading turrets

etc.
